Spotify plans to roll out lossless, offering 24-bit / 44.1 kHz FLAC audio, to all Premium users in the next two months, without needing a new higher-priced tier  —  Subscribers will be able to enjoy 24-bit / 44.1 kHz FLAC as part of their Premium plan. … It's been a long time coming but Spotify is finally getting lossless audio.

items.title: How to score AirPods Pro 2 at $150 less than the new series 3 model
items.summary:
Apple’s new AirPods Pro 3 have arrived and are now up for pre-order with a series of new features, better ANC, heart-rate monitoring, and more. But the AirPods Pro 2 were the world’s most popular wireless buds for a reason and if you’re not looking to drop the full $249 on the new series 3 set, Woot is offering a notable factory refurbished deal on AirPods Pro 2 down at $99.99 Prime shipped using code EARBUDS20 at checkout with a full Amazon warranty.

items.title: Up to 50% off launch deals on ESR’s iPhone 17 cases now live: MagSafe-compatible models with Camera Control from just $10
items.summary:
Apple’s iPhone 17 lineup is now official, and it arrives with a wave of new cases and accessories. We’ve already looked at options from brands like Spigen and Nomad, and now ESR is joining the mix with its iPhone 17 case collection – currently available with launch discounts of up to 50% off. ESR has new cases for the entire iPhone 17 lineup, including the standard iPhone 17, Air, and the Pro models, and they’re starting at just $9.99 Prime shipped right now. All these models are MagSafe-compatible and have a dedicated Camera Control button, and they’re all available in a bunch of different finishes. Head below for a closer look and more details.

items.summary:
Apple has now officially unleashed its next-generation iPhone 17 lineup, Apple Watch Series 11, Apple Watch SE3, Apple Watch Ultra 3, and the new AirPods Pro 3. All of this joins a host of new accessories and is now up for pre-order (iPhone 17 pre-sales go live on Friday though). While you can of course pre-order all of the new gear straight from Apple, it is also all now live on Amazon, and if you have some FREE store credit on your account from all of the promotional offers we have featured over the last several months – there were hundreds in Amazon credit promotions live for Prime Day this year – you can now leverage it on the new Apple gear.

If you were making a list of the best iPhone cases, Nomad would definitely be on it, and quite possibly at the very top. The new Leather Nomad iPhone 17 case lineup has arrived with a series of its beloved designs to match Apple’s new form-factor alongside a brand new Rugged model. These offerings also join its more sporty cases and the magnetic back case we featured last year. Proper camera buttons are at the ready on everything. Details below.

items.title: Save $100 while bringing 10-in-1 functionality to your countertops with Ninja’s Foodi XL Pro at its $230 annual low (Reg. $330)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering a return to the best 2025 rate on Ninja’s Foodi XL Pro 10-in-1 Air Fryer and Toaster Oven for $229.99 shipped. This heavy-duty kitchen countertop refresher usually fetches $330 at full price, with discounts over the year having taken the costs down to this same rate or stopping it a bit higher at $250. While we have seen it go lower in the past, you’re otherwise looking at the best price we have tracked over 2025, with the 30% markdown here cutting $100 off the tag for you.

items.summary:
By way of its official Amazon storefront, ROVE is offering some solid low pricing on two variations of dash cam setups, with things starting at the R2-4K Pro Dash Cam at $84.97 shipped, while its dual-cam package doesn’t sit much higher at $99.99 shipped. The smaller of these two normally goes for $110 at full price these days, with discounts regularly returning the costs to this same low price. The dual-cam setup is seeing a drop to its second-best price to date, beaten out by the drop to $90 we saw back in May.

items.title: EGO’s modular Nexus power station with two 7.5Ah batteries can also refuel your arsenal at $899 (Reg. $1,099)
items.summary:
At Amazon, you can currently find the EGO Power+ Nexus Portable Power Station with two 7.5Ah batteries at $899 shipped. This bundled package usually runs for $1,099 without discounts, which we’ve mostly seen keeping down near $999 with discounts. While these drops to $899 are usually rare sightings, the price has been holding out strong since mid-August, with no telling how much longer it may last. Aside from the $838 low we saw once back during Black Friday, you’re otherwise looking at the best tracked price, which saves you $200 off the going rate. If you already have a collection of EGO ARC batteries, you can pick the station up on its own for $593.

items.summary:
Amazon is now offering the JBL Boombox 3 Portable Bluetooth Speaker at $380.23 shipped. You’d usually be shelling out $500 for this speaker at full price, which has been regularly spending time down at $400 throughout 2025. We did spot it dropping to $360 and $340 last month in Prime-exclusive deals, though if you missed out on those rates, you can pick it up today at the same price we saw during July’s Prime Day event. All-in-all, this is a 24% markdown that cuts $120 off the going rate and lets you go BIG with all your portable audio needs.

Fullmosa Black Stainless Steel Apple Watch Band

Buy for $12.50 (Reg. $17)

Clip the on-page 26% off coupon.

What we love

For a while, it felt like Apple Watch was one of those devices you needed to upgrade every year or two. Mainly because the power was lacking. Over the last few generations, that has become less of an issue with performance being enough to handle most of the quick interactions I personally use. So if you’re sticking with Series 9 or older, this band may be worth adding to your collection at just $12.50.

Buy for $24.50 (Reg. $34)

We’ve seen loads of gear with retractable USB-C cables show up over the last year or so, and you’re looking at Anker’s take on a car charger that has one. items.summary:
ORIA 46-in-1 Precision Screwdriver Set

Buy for $14.50 (Reg. $19)

Clip the on-page 20% off coupon.

What we love

This affordable tool kit from ORIA wields more than 40 magnetic bits, all of which fit inside of the included storage case. The entire kit is designed to be incredibly compact, measuring just 5.8 by 1.5 by 1.5 inches in size. I bought an iFixit kit a while back and despite having roughly the same amount of bits, it’s a whole lot larger than this one.

items.title: JBL’s Flip 7 waterproof Bluetooth speaker with interchangeable accessories is back to $100 low
items.summary:
As part of its wider sale on audio gear, Woot is now offering JBL’s Flip 7 portable Bluetooth speaker in blue for $99.95 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). This model debuted back in April with a $150 price tag, and today’s deal knocks $50 off, bringing it back down to the lowest price we tracked before the recent Prime Day sale. Unlike last time, though, even the black and red variants are down to $100 low today, making this a great time to cash in and pick between a few color options. For comparison, Amazon still has it listed at the full $150, so be sure to jump in and lock in the discounted prices at Woot.

more…
